GETTING-STARTED-DESC: An overview of Smoke, how to download and use.
DOWNLOAD-DESC: Download Smoke and add it to your proyect, It's simple and quick of use.
WHATS-INCLUDED-DESC: Once downloaded, unzip the .zip file to see the structure of Smoke. You will see something like this:
REQUIRED-DESC: To work, Smoke plugin requires these two libraries
REQUIRED-JQUERY: Note that the Smoke plugin requires the jQuery library included.
REQUIRED-BOOTSTRAP: Note that the Smoke plugin requires the Bootstrap 3 framework included.
BASIC-TEMPLATE-DESC: Start with this HTML basic template or modify it to your needs.
BASIC-TEMPLATE-DESC2: Copy the HTML code below to get started with the minimum requirements of Smoke.
VALIDATE-DESC: It makes the form validation on client side easy, simple and safer.
INPUT-EMPTY-DESC: To validate a field that is mandatory only have to add the <code> required </ code> attribute within the <code> input </ code> . The field types supported so far are <code> text </ code>, <code> textarea </ code>, <code> email </ code>, <code> password </ code>, <code> select </ code>, <code> radio </ code> and <code> checkbox </ code>. The function used to validate is <span class = 'text-success'> smkValidate () </ span>.
INPUT-EMPTY-NOTE: It is necessary that the <code> input </ code> to validate is inside a <code> div </ code> with the <code> form-group </ code> class
INPUT-EMAIL-DESC: To validate an email account, the field must be of type <code> email </ code> and add <code> required </ code> attribute within the <code> input </ code>.
INPUT-ALPHANUMERIC-DESC: To validate a field that accepts only numbers and letters, the field must be of type text, add the required attribute within the input tag, likewise add the  smk-type attribute and within this  the alphanumeric property.
INPUT-NUMBER-DESC: To validate that a field only accepts numbers, the field must be of type <code> text </ code>, add the <code> required </ code> attribute in the <code> input </ code> tag. likewise add the <code> smk-type </ code>  attribute and within this, the <code> number </ code> attribute.
INPUT-NUMBERRANGE-DESC: To validate a field that only accepts numbers and within in a range, the field must be of type <code> text </ code>, add the <code> required </ code> attribute within the  <code> input </ code> tag. In the same way add the <code> smk-type </ code> and within this, the <code> number </ code> attribute, also add the <code> smk-min </ code> and <code> smk-max </ code> attributes to indicate the range allowed.
INPUT-DECIMAL-DESC: To validate a field that only accepts decimal numbers, that field must be of type <code> text </ code>, add the <code> required </ code> attribute in the <code> input </ code>. likewise,  add the <code> smk-type </ code> and within this, the <code> decimal </ code> attribute.
INPUT-CURRENCY-DESC: To validate a field that only accepts numbers, commas, dots, ie a currency format, the field must be of type <code> text </ code>, add the <code> required </ code> attribute within the <code> input </ code> tag. In the same way add the <code> smk-type </ code> attribute and within this, the <code> currency </ code> property.
NUMBER-CHARACTER-DESC: To validate a field that only accept a certain number of characters, add the <code> required </ code> attribute within the <code> input </ code> tag. Likewise add the <code> minLength </ code > and <code> maxlength </ code> attributes and within these the number of characters allowed.
RANGE-CHARACTER-DESC: To validate a field that only accepts a range of a number of characters, add the <code> required </ code> attribute within the <code> input </ code> tag. Likewise add <code> minLength </ code> and <code> maxlength </ code> attributes, and within these, the range of number of characters allowed.
STRONG-PASSWORD-DESC: To validate a field that accepts only a strong and secure password, the field must be of type <code> password </ code>, add the <code> required </ code> attribute in the <code> input </ code > tag and finally add the <code> smk-strongPass </ code> attribute and within this, the hard level required.

DESCS.MEDIUM: 6 alphanumeric characters and at least one of them must to be numerical
DESCS.STRONG: 6 characters minimum, combining numbers and lowercase and uppercase letters.

EQUAL-PASSWORD-DESC: To validate the texts contained in two fields are equal, Add the <code> required </ code> attribute within the etiquette <code> input </ code> in the first field. The function used is <span class = 'text-success'> $. SmkEqualPass () </ span>.
EQUAL-PASSWORD-VAR-DESC: To validate that the text content of a field is equal to the value of a JavaScript variable, add the <code> required </ code> attribute within the etiquette <code> input </ code> . The function used is <span class = 'text-success'> $. SmkEqualPass () </ span>.
CLEAR-FORM-DESC: To clean forms use the <span class = 'text-success'> smkClear () </ span> function. For not cleaning one or more types of fields, use the option <span class = 'text-primary'> noClear </ span> within the function.
CUSTOMIZE-MESSAGE-DESC: Customize the error message by adding the <code> smk-text </ code> within the etiquette <code> input </ code>
LANGUAGE-DESC: To change the language of validation messages, Add in the html the needed script and then, the language is passed into the <code> lang </ code> option in the <span class = 'text-success'> smkValidate () </ span>. funtion.
NOTIFICATIONS-DESC: Create funcional and coloful Alert or confirmations messages and its use is as simple as the natives of javascript.
ALERTS-DESC: It provides alert messages for the typical user actions when invoking an event.

ALERTS-TB.DESC: Customize alerts, changing the message, color, duration or if the alert will be permanent.

DESCS.TIME: Duration of the alert in seconds

CONFIRMATION-DESC: It provides a confirmation message for the typical users actions when invoke an event..

CONFIRMATION-TB.DESC: Customize the confirmations, changing the message and the text on the buttons.

PROGRESSBAR-DESC: Add a progress bar to your application.
PROGRESSBAR-DESC2: Add a progress bar to your application in any event.

PROGRESSBAR-TB.DESC: Customize the element in which the progress bar will be added. Define when it starts and when it finishes.

DESCS.ELEMENT: Elemento en el que se agregara el progressBar
DESCS.STATUS: When it starts and when finishes

FULLSCREEN-DESC: Add Fullscreen Functionality to your application.
FULLSCREEN-DESC2: Para agregar el boton de pantalla completa solo es necesario indicarle a la funcion cual sera su contenedor.
PANEL-DESC2: Add functionality to your panels, minimizing,expanding or removing them.

PANEL-TB.DESC: Customize the buttons that you want to show.

STRING-FLOAT-DESC: Convierte una cadena de texto a un valor flotante.
NUMBER-CURRENCY-DESC: Convierte un número a formato de moneda.
NUMBER-CURRENCY-NOTE: Esta función recibe dos parámetros el primero es el número que se va a formatear y el segundo es el prefijo o el tipo de moneda.
URL-NOTE: Esta función recibe un parámetro (opcional) es el número de carpetas para obener después de la URL.
DATE-DESC: With this function you can get, format, translate and customize dates
DATE-NOTE: To change the language of the date, Add the script of the language in your HTML.
DATE-DIFF-DESC: Get the difference between two dates
